title: Pears! 7 Common Types and How to Use Them
description: If you’re browsing your local farmer’s market, you’ll probably see more than seven types of pears. You may even discover a totally new (and vaguely unpronounceable) variety that becomes your favorite. But for now, let’s talk basics. What’s the difference between a Bartlett and a Bosc? And which one should you pick up for your afternoon snack?These seven types of pears are what we see most often at the grocery store. READ MORE...
author: Elizabeth Passarella
